__e: I'm sure that life evolved without death at first and found that without death, life didn't work very well. Because it didn't make room for the young who didn't know how the world was, you know, 50 years ago, but who saw it as it is today without any preconceptions and dreamed how it could be based on that.
A couple of hours ago, I realized that my body was no longer functioning properly.
Time of death, 6:40pm, if we assume she was wearing these clothes yesterday and her watch was in good working order.
And even though I hadn't been in combat, people would give you a certain amount of credence, of course, because I knew a whole lot about how the military functioned.
Time passed, and I wanted to learn more about how the world worked, Especially the world of money.
And the way in which the world worked was gonna have to change.
